title: [Large-scale] Project-based Learning for Information Literacy Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital information retrieval and application experience
context.additional_context: Learners select socially relevant topics to conduct information collection, analysis, and evaluation in project-based formats, accessing online resources via personal devices. Progress is monitored through formative assessments, with rubric-based feedback reinforcing information literacy skills.

learning_goals: Identify and evaluate at least three credible information sources related to social issues using established criteria
Systematically organize collected information and create a reference list following citation guidelines
Reflect on personal information utilization processes based on rubric criteria and develop improvement plans
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
